lines.text: No, it's true, but we need to figure out how we're going to talk our way into this place tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should have said something, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I tried but the little guy got away before I spoke--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What little guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was a little goblin guy. Which, by the way, none of you should trust.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He will turn around and stab you in the back the second you're not looking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why will he do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he's a goblin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grab the snapper by the tail and I start gesturing. Let me get this straight. I went to ask questions, you knocked, and some goblin came out of what, the balcony and started answering your questions and then disappeared.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The front door. Can't you see it right there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it still there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, as you guys are all talking and you look back, the door is not there anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I toss it like SeaWorld.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Toss it like SeaWorld!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (dolphin squeaking)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, save that paper. Caleb will want it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ducey! Did this happen?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you just knocked and a door appeared?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, it shouldn't have come out of my mouth. It's inherently untrustworthy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, I liked it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is not true, Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It just seemed so fantastic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, honestly it was the path of least resistance that surprised me as well. I'm used to things being difficult. Maybe I just make things difficult.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't think that's it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe I'm having a moment of self-realization.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's not do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ride it. I approve of this. This is great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we come back in the morning--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to need some information to give to get in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What information?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Something that would make a powerful mage want to talk to us. We need to know a magical secret--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uk'otoa.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or talk to him about Uk'otoa--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have a ton of magical secrets.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: We also have the dodecahedron.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have the Happy Fun Time Ball.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, the Happy Fun Time Ball!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We witnessed an attack on another wizard's tower in Zadash. I wasn't lying when I said magic people might be under attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. These are all truths.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if-- You know how all these things were stolen from people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if maybe they were stolen from this guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We walk in and we say, "Are you missing anything?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But then we'll have to give it back to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not without money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how it works here in Nicodranas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That might be okay though, Jester. What if we give it back and he answers us some amazing questions or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want questions. I want to go back to the Fappy--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Happy Fun Time Ball! There are so many secrets there! The Fappy Fun Time Ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a true artifact, to be fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) I will never come out again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, maybe we don't offer that right away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we have to offer the dodecahedron, either. We have our eyewitness accounts of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb will know what to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb should have been here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah and we really should go back and get some good dinner and some sleep so we can get back here toot-sweet!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know we all know that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With magic especially.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you guys have noticed he's not necessarily the best talker, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's an amazing talker. He's charming and handsome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think also, since you seem to be leaning towards honesty, I'm always a big fan of honesty being the best way to approach these. Or as much of the truth as is possible at any moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you can justify anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm always happier to omit than lie if we have to. Lying's weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we're bonding. Why have you never told me this before? You should have led with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huh. I don't know what that means, but I agree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get a room!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have one! Let's go back to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too much has been happening here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys return to the Lavish Chateau?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long were roughly did all this mess last before they come back? How long have I been in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you--

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: We're going back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So they've been gone for roughly, I'd say, two hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ugh. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that bad?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Potion I bought is for Caleb, so Caleb gets the healing potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a standard healing potion Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm busy. Come back later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to the tower tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you still have the fish or did you eat the fish?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I ate just a part of the tail but the rest of is a little chewed on but in paper for dinner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chef offers to prepare that as your dinner is already being set for the rest of the group at the request of the Ruby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would have been in whatever chambers were given to us so if Caduceus came in with that potion, I barely nodded and just kept doing what I was doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, Caleb's hair is this cowlick mess where it's perpetual dog tongue licking the entire time that he's been having to concentrate on his business.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin is bushed out. The tail is bushed out. It's all over and is just staring at Nugget.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as I come home, I go: Nugget, home!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (dog panting) Then jumps towards you, but from ten feet and then appears right in front of you and knocks you into the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love him. We're home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marion comes and greets you guys. Dinner is prepared. Meal is enjoyed and you all prepare yourselves to bed down for the evening and take on your events of the following day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in a few minutes after we have our short break. As a reminder, we have our Wyrmwood giveaway of tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind of wood is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leather interior. White oak. From our friends at Wyrmwood for one lucky winner this evening. The keyword tonight is "home."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back. So before we get back into the story, our winner of our Wyrmwood giveaway this week is Sasudo456. Sasudo456, congratulations, we'll have that sent off to you ASAP. After an evening's rest in the luxurious rooms of the Lavish Chateau and a fine breakfast, what would you like to do for the day in Nicodranas?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Run, double-dash back towards the wizard's tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, appointment in the morning, he said come back in the morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, what is going to get us in that door? Is it information about Uk'otoa?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What door, what are you talking about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We talked about this over dinner last night--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I didn't eat with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyway--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't come to the dinner at all, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's just being coy. We need a story to get us past the fucking goblin-man who's keeping us from getting in the tower. Something to share, something that his master Yussa Errenis would find yussa-ful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before we go down that road, may I ask what is our actual purpose that we are not telling him about? Why are we doing this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to see the inside!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it's just because we think it's cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an actual reason.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A powerful mage, with access to magical spells and books.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we are going to go in and case the joint to rob him blind?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Maybe we just take a few books.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he's really nice and he wants to be our best friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have some legitimate questions about things that I am curious about, and we do actually own some objects that maybe we should have a learned man take a look at.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We told him it was an emergency, so we still have to go forward with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what is going to be an emergency for a man that's not threatened by the things that you're threatened by?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uk'otoa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There seems to be a lot of weird things happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is no one into talking about the tower getting attacked in Zadash?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's true, and it's impending danger, I like that one a lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do too, there is a war brewing in the Empire, it is going to spill south. That is not a lie, that is an inevitability. So I feel that we can talk to him, and trust me, no one in this room is more curious about the inside of that tower than I am, but to what end are we doing this? Like are we going to go to the hilt, are we going to slay this mage and take his books, or make nice conversation and steal a book? It seems like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could just make nice conversation and ask for a book. Oh god, I'm starting to sound like Caduceus!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you better watch yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that didn't really sound like him very much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can be a lot lower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus is very soothing to listen to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to know what he knows, if he knows more about Uk'otoa or maybe how to counteract him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right, there is still one Uk'otoa gate out there that we don't know where it is, maybe this mage knows where it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we've seen some shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I am curious, and Beauregard is correct that it is something we could legitimately talk about without spilling the beans about everything that everyone has got going on with themselves, and I am, of course, curious. I just want to make sure. You know, I've talked about calculated risks before, and I don't want to run willy-nilly towards folly like we have done with the boat. We are all standing here, but that was foolish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, at the end of the day, this guy has access, right? Making him our ally in some way could come in useful, even in ways we might not be aware yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think, Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I mean, do what you're going to do, just try not to get us killed by a wizard, please?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, of the utmost importance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's so poignant when she speaks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just don't need to be too pushy.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all have questions, and there's a lot of unknowns out there, and if this person could check off just one of the boxes, then that would be worth it. Maybe we make an ally and he can check off more than one box, tell us about the dodecahedron.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Check off a bunch of boxes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, well potentially he could turn us over to people that we are not interested in turned over to. But I'm not saying no, let's just be careful, that's all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fair enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, this guy is anti-Clovis Concord, so, I don't know. I don't think he's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I worry that he's going to do something to you Caleb, personally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling this guy is a bit of a rogue agent in terms of-- Right? Because the Clovis Concord-- Sorry, a little repeat of the Concord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Clovis Concord is a union of all the various city-states that make up--

lines.name: MARISHA, MATT
lines.text: The Menagerie Coast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're like the government for Menagerie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. While each city is locally governed in and of itself, for the marquis that run all the various merchant guilds-- It's very much a guild-centric government.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like an oligarchy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like the early colonies here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, in a way. But all the marquis work together to maintain a generally consistent rule of law and maintain peace and order through that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're anti this guy because he's outside of their--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know how they feel about him, but from what you heard from the Ruby is that he seems to be the one person who won't sell their house in the neighborhood to get the train tracks built, you know? That kind of thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just wrote down "the chagrin of the Clovis Concord," so I'm assuming that's what she said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So who did the knocking last time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you do anything special?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It was a real special knock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you replicate it today?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then get after it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we right in front of the tower?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We had a walk-and-talk just now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys have been walking and talking towards the tower in the early morning hours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Power-walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you guys make your way to the Open Quay, you approach the tower. All right, you knock?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take notes, Fjord. Knock, knock, knock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grabbed her elbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a pause. "Can I help you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, does that not sound like a goblin? Where is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it on our side, or around the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're hearing it around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see about 30 feet up, that balcony that was there originally is there, and standing at the edge of it you see a figure. Hard to see at this angle and this distance, but a figure is there with long, dull golden robes, holding a small teacup and a saucer, glancing over the edge and looking down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were hoping for an audience if you have time this morning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You just happened to approach and knock for an audience?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We came by yesterday, and we were told it might be best to come back in the morning. We brought tea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Did you make an appointment with Wensfeld?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, he said to come back in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's an emergency.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have really good tea!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Earl Grey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you make persuasion checks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have Earl Grey, I don't think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First good roll of the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do have Earl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one. We don't have Earl Grey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it appears that you have not made an appointment, and you do not "have the tea that you are promising."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we have better tea than that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a fine tea-maker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give him some information!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We also have news of grave import.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From Zadash, from the Empire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dangerous information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then, please, would you be so kind as to present me with this dangerous information."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you want our tea, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We might not want to shout it in the streets, up to you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't have to shout it." You notice that his voice is a whisper, even though he's 30 feet away from you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We feel a bit exposed, I would admit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're safe." There's some sort of amplification to his voice and it's placing it omnipresent around you at this low volume, like he's right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we tell from where we are if he's human or elven, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing up, he appears to be elven, a darker complexion, which is different from the elves of Bysaes Tyl, up in the Empire, which come from the north near Uthudurn, which was mentioned before, so this is probably an elf from Gwardan, which is one of the coastal cities here, which originated from Marquet long ago, like a lot of the Menagerie Coast did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Deep Lore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Knows it all!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some people have hobbies, I stay at home and write this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull a pouch of my better tea and... I'm not really sure what to do with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give him some info!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you ever heard of The Blooming Grove?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes a second. "I'm sure that it's crossed my path, but it is not in my "immediate peripheral."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very rare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Choose one, and enter."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Just one person gets to go in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look down to talk amongst yourselves, and there's a door on the wall that wasn't there when your attention was faced away from it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not fucking with this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you punch Fjord for no reason?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eliminate your enemies!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (quietly) Maybe take someone who can get word out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're making a big assumption that word can leave.

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not. It's either probably you or me, I suppose. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You plus one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You plus one. You get a plus one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought it was just choose one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was telling him to choose one and enter, so there is a plus one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, there is a plus one!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get all the things we might want to show him together really quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What might we want to show him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want the dodecahedron.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to show him the dodecahedron.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) But you can look at it and get a little lucky luck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe he'll see us looking at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did he just hear that entire conversation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll talk about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three notes are ask about Uk'otoa, I trust you, make good decisions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any evidence? Do we have any items from the Xhorhasian-- the crick that we found?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't call him a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you trust me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well yeah, but I don't know him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, you keep it, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want Fappy Fun Ball?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do want Fappy Fun Ball?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we give him Fappy Fun Ball?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I may, with your permission, mention what we have? Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't lose this, okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the Fappy Fun Ball.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only if it leads to something better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caduceus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Try and be good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caduceus, just bringing this up: you know that Beau ruins every situation she's in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't do that, Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And is horribly abrasive to talk to and sometimes look at.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not true. You're beautiful and you're also really nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like between Beau and I, we cover everything very well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not taking the dodecahedron in, right?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But one of you should look at it before you go in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't need it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got some high charisma, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just for a minute. Look at it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look up at Yussa. Is he watching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should take Caleb, he's a master of magic!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're going in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, go in. Go, that's your fate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go in!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach out, there's no handle for the door, you place your hand on it, and it opens inside. As soon as you look within-- and the rest of you can see around the rather hulking form of Caduceus, which you have to duck to get through the doorway-- on the inside it looks to be a very simple sitting room, a den. You can see two couches facing each other at an angle, with a deep red-brown maroon upholstery to it, a velvety texture.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we went in, I wanted to-- can I bring Frumpkin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got to do that now, because you're walking in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give me Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you not want to see in this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is closing behind Caduceus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck it, I'll leave. He won't give me his damn cat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this set of two couches, a small table, there's already a small platter that has a couple of small teacups and a teakettle of some kind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brewed or unbrewed? Just ready to be brewed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. The rest of the chamber has no windows, it's all locked off. There is a chandelier above, very simple metal ring that has these glass baubles placed in six different places along it that give a soft, pulsing-- similar to firelight-- a warm, orange glow. It's a nice dark, comfortable den atmosphere. What do you guys do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to check to see if there's tea brewed, and if there isn't, I'll brew tea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no tea brewed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will brew some tea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes and sits on-- Are you both sitting at the same couch?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. He goes and quietly sits in the one across. Sits back. There is a stoic, emotionless face there, head cocked to the side out of curiosity. "Well, while you finish your tea "you have promised, what is this emergency you have brought to my attention "and interrupted my morning routine for?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I deeply-- You have a morning routine? Oh that's impressive-- Sorry! Deeply apologize for interrupting. We're from Zadash. We are a hired mercenary group here to deliver very specific information, from Zadash, about an attack that happened on the Zauber Spire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And at whose behest have you been hired to deliver this information to me?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it is a joint effort between the Hall of Erudition and the Cobalt Soul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He eyes you very closely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So unlikely alliances are happening all across the continent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So part of this is requesting alliance with the Cobalt Soul?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a friendly passing off of information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Is the tea ready?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The tea is indeed ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How wonderful. Pour it if you do not mind. Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course, if you would like to discuss alliances...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stick to what we know, for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is quite good."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I'll leave some extra for later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd appreciate it. Blooming Grove, yes. Is there a name to this one?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Each tea is made mystically from a family that is buried within our graveyard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This I recall since you brought it up, yes. Thank you. Continue, please."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I guess just a friendly passing of information and that maybe you would like to exchange information in return, if you might know anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, offer your information and if there is something I can offer that seems "relative or involved, I will be happy to pass it along as well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trying real hard here, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Good. Excellent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, as we mentioned, the Xhorhasian army has breached into the empire. We witnessed an attack from crick assassins on the tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't. I was told--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. He wasn't with us at the time, but the rest of us did witness an attack and encountered the Xhorhasian ourselves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This was the assault on the Tri-Spire, correct?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct. I see you've heard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Word gets around, in certain circles."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beyond that we've recently heard that the Xhorhasians have reached Felderwin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard this as well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our group has been on the ocean, in search for further information on behalf of the Empire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The ocean seems a strange place to seek for information when the Xhorhasians "are fighting in the East."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're not wrong. We got word halfway through, in a jungle, that a lesser god that likes to go by the name of Uk'otoa might have some sway in everything that's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uk'otoa is a mythological entity in the history of the Ki'Nau, the people who were of this "coast before the Marquesians came. So I've heard of it, but it has been long gone."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think so. I think he's on the verge of returning, and I think there might be followers and patrons who might be aiding that cause.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You think this Uk'otoa is connected to this war in the east?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have reason to believe that maybe some Xhorhasian spies and soldiers might be worshipers of Uk'otoa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are a lot of strange things all happening in congruence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are strange things happening all across Exandria at any given time. To find the "threads that truly tie them, that takes an insightful mind. Continue."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (nervous laugh) Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You wouldn't happen to have any ideas would you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, to be honest, there are many jungle landscapes on this coast. I have not heard "anything of Uk'otoa's location, nor is it of any particular interest to me at the moment."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (quietly) Next!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beyond that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Checking the boxes, checking the boxes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We found a thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tell me of this thing you found."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (aside) Which thing should I tell him about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start with the least interesting and work your way up, I suppose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was presented to us as the Happy Fun Time Ball.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually have it, if I recall, I grabbed it from you. I'm going to put it on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see his fingers trace a few small gestures in the air, speaking very quietly under his breath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A bright green dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interesting."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Odd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How did you come about this?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think she thought it was a toy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things keep stumbling upon us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How does this connect to the war in the east?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things that should not be... Things are becoming misplaced that should not be misplaced. I feel like that fact that we have this means that a powerful magic user is no longer available. People of great power going missing and getting attacked. The tower. All these things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are not wrong. The individual who this belongs to, however, "has been missing for quite some time."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Apparently, if I recall, is no longer with us now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well there is no confirmation of that, but has not been seen in many, many years."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems like everyone is getting butterfingers with their magical items or magical folk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interesting."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And there was also-- The grove is dying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is this related to the corruption from Malaismere?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. Perhaps. I asked the Wildmother for guidance and it brought me to this. That certainly sparks my interest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I recall this Blooming Grove exists in the Savalierwood, correct?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The fact that it's been able to resist the corruption of the forest this long "is in itself a testament to its guardians"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you know anything of its sister temples? Of whether they hold or not? If...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not think that is my specialty, unfortunately. I am not a purveyor of faith."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would it be diminishing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could not tell you. Perhaps it was an imperfect enchantment, or perhaps the magic that "holds sway over the Savalierwood is growing stronger. But that would be--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be odd in itself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would, but unfortunately that is beyond my specialties."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you not find it concerning that the Savalierwood is on the borderlines of the Xhorhasian Empire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is on the borders, actually, of the Greying Wildlands in the north. It is closer to "the Empire than it is Xhorhas, so it would a bigger threat to the King Bertrand Dwendal than "it would be to any of the Kryn Dynasty."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Yeah, I actually knew that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But it seems to only spread through the forest and seems to be proximity to Malaismere's "ruins, so it has been that way for a number of centuries. If there is a sign of it expanding into "the Pearlbow Wilderness, then that is something you should definitely let the king know, but I do not "know of any signs of that. Once again, I do not mean to rush you, but--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how to best describe it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure you have very keen eyes and you saw the artifact that I was looking at before I entered into this tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I saw something. I do not know the nature of it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It appears to be a magical geometric orb that has the ability to bend elements of time and space and fate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These are radical claims that you make."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've seen into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is dangerous."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that would be a longer conversation for when you have time if you feel like investing in what we're doing and how we're moving about the world.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We mentioned we were not your ordinary folk. So, as you can see, things happen to fall into our lap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you bring them to me why?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need allies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need people who are better than ourselves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you mentioned, we have very powerful artifacts that we're not very sure about. But our options are turning them over to the empire, which doesn't seem attractive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are your allegiances?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Depends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To the Wildmother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Depends on who's offering at the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you have no allegiances? You can be bought any which way, depending on the offer?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She has allegiances to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That does not inspire trust."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I want to know the individuals that I would work with can be trusted."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, if you're down, I'm down, is what I'm saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What are the terms you're offering?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As I've spent some time with these people, they are people of the world, but I've found Ms. Beau and the rest of them to be loyal to each other, which I find to be a very admirable trait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But she says she has no loyalty unless the world pulls her in a direction."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I said I had loyalty to these people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh god, I need to stress eat. Get it open!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But that is indeed a loyalty, then."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course, and I have a few slots open in my loyalty bank, so if you're willing to pay the price of rental--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, a voice comes around the corner from the staircase above that goes, "Sir! "Just got some sort of a--" and the goblin starts running. He goes, "Not now, Wensfeld!" Turns back up the steps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would like to know that you are a good and trustworthy person and we would, respectfully, like to trade, perhaps, some information and have a friendly face on the coast we would be most grateful for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So what you are saying is you are a band of unaligned roving mercenaries in search of "alliances outside of the political interests of this current conflict?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. The others do not know, I believe, how things may change soon and I think it would be good. And I think they're going to turn well. I think they're going to turn out very well, but I think it would be good to have the right people in the corner when it is time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then what do you hope to gain from my alliance?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Information, for the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "About?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: About the things in our possession, powers that we are tapping into, the people we may come across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And eventually what favors would you be asking?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want the truth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is not my fucking best. I'm better at lying! That's not too bad! 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With more loyalty earned, perhaps you'll see more "of my tower. But for now," and he looks over to the door. The door opens up. "The rest of your "friends can enter. Let's have a conversation."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did that door just fucking open?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we go in? Does it mean we can go in? Are they coming out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (crossbow cocking)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (falchion summoning)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb puts away the romance novel that he has sped read halfway through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I drop the fish that I was half-done eating.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our host is aware of our positions and otherwise. I would ask that everyone try and be respectful of the space. Try not to break anything, steal anything, or otherwise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Most definitely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Try not to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk in very politely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys enter again, the rest of the group--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the goblin at the door, not this mage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the goblin is gone. Literally, he's still sitting on the couch, the door just opened and he's waiting for you all to enter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we all see him from where we are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Total poker face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (humming)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's go in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) I'm already in the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb takes the rear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stayed on the couch?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I? Yeah, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I stood up and waved everybody in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are staying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, Nott, Fjord, Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. At this point, Yussa closes his eyes for a second, whispers something. "Welcome to "my chambers. So, now that we've gotten some conversation underway, I would like to know who I "am speaking with. You are all what? Who?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't even attempt. You are?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fjord."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beauregard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm Caleb Widogast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm Nott.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jester Lavore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Again, it's a pleasure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha just gives a nod. "Yasha." "I am Yussa Errenis. I am the owner of the Open Quay, and I "have been a practitioner of the arcane arts in seclusion for over 200 years. You carry with you "something that is very dangerous and I would very much like to stay here, because the longer it's on "your persons, the larger chance there is you misuse it and destroy yourselves, or it falls in "the hands of someone who should not have it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We almost died in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Case in point."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm assuming he's talking about the Happy Fun Ball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would ask, just so that it doesn't get me into trouble with my compatriots that I convinced that honesty and forthrightness was the best policy--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Should you wish to come and discuss or see it, or we can compare notes "on our experiences, you know where it is."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was hoping for, perhaps, a trade so that they felt that they got something back in return. It doesn't have to, obviously, be so dangerous. If you have something that at least they can feel like they can hold something in the meantime.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am doing you a favor. I will study it. I will keep it here where it's safe. If you have need of it, "if you need to come look at it, or wish to learn of its secrets, do so in my presence, "where it can be done safely."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about a non-monetary exchange?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It looks like within your coat you are holding tomes. Are you a practitioner of the "arcane arts yourself?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you the capabilities to transport your compatriots via circles of arcane nature?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Via circles of arc-- Transportation, you mean to jump from one city to another? That sort of thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not as of yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he learns very fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you teach him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I may perhaps have something like that, but at the very least I do keep such a circle "reserved for the select friends I keep."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here in your home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Does that seem like a fair trade, those who seek friends and allies?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no objection.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems very fair, yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long until you can do something like that, Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably any day. He reads a lot of books.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any type of scrolls or spell books--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or candy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or candy that you could lend to Caleb's aid, further advancing his ability to learn that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm, by the way, already putting the ball on the table and leaving it by the tea tray as we have this discussion. I have definitely moved it to the center of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He takes it and lifts it, inspects it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can let you know what we saw inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He wraps it into his robe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It drops gold sometimes, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The robe, you watch as he places it over the sphere and the shape beneath just dissipates.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have some knowledge of where that leads?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of where this leads? I do. And the mage it once belonged to."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know him personally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I do not know him personally, but there are few in my circles that have not heard of his "exploits in the past."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was he a good guy or a bad guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At a certain level of arcane practitioning, morality becomes a bit ambiguous, but to the "common man, I would say probably not a very team player."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we ever get confirmation on the owner's death or did we not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we just assumed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because his pet dragon hadn't seen him in a long time or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And yes, I do have access to various spells, but I've earned them. I'm willing to share "knowledge based on the development of our friendship and proven loyalty."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we prove our loyalty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "By not fucking me over."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We haven't fucked you over once!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We gave you a cool ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You did, and I made a trade of information and a safe haven. When you find more information "like this, and more items like this, bring them back to me. There may be times where, perhaps, I "could use some help in doing things that I'm not comfortable leaving my tower for. Maybe you could "be of aid in that case. There will be opportunities, I'm sure, to earn more trust."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb extends his hand out slowly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sad one."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you have to earn."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything that we can do for you in the short term?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything to keep an eye out for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would like very much to see this other... thing that you have come across. If this "is a powerful artifact, I am very curious as to what other geometric shapes you've come across."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That we-- I think we feel also would be something that we would be interested in doing once we feel even more comfortable with this arrangement, and once trust is built.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once you have earned our trust.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously, you are so much more powerful than we are that it would behoove us to be a little careful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you could probably just kill us right now if you wanted to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, really, he probably could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are not incorrect."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is not to be left here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, might I at least possibly inquire as to what it is capable of? You may not know the "dangers you carry with you as you obviously did not understand of this sphere."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have a better understanding of this one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As traveling mercenaries, we're used to being in danger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It makes babies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (quietly) It does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, they talked about-- yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have a geometric shape that makes babies?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would it be possible to get an assurance that we could leave this place with it and that no harm would come to us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I think if he knew that it helps us on our exploits--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which thereby helps him. I mean, we are sharing, aren't we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm willing to take a certain person at their word.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We wish to bring it with us when we leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No matter what. Also, we would appreciate it if you would not speak of who owns this artifact with anyone. If you have to discuss the artifact, that's one thing, but we would prefer us to be anonymous. It's a dangerous world. And it would show great trust.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am generally uncomfortable in making deals regarding passing glances at "world-shattering artifacts, if that be the case, but you have blessed me with some fine tea this day."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bring more the next time I go home, if there's a home to go to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Let me see it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? Are we sure about this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's time to trust somebody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the iron safe, and then-- yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Give us a helping hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you already look at it today?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) Takes a moment and concentrates on it, and you watch his face go slack-- a familiar expression that many of you have seen your friends as they concentrate on it do so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aww, it'll be so disappointing when they pass through the illusion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. You think a mage lets people into his living room unprotected, are you kidding me? You don't live as long as he has without some sort of backup.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got Banishment on hold, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a minute passes, and then the muscles in his face tighten back into his neutral expression. "This is-- I have studied much, and this is new to me. I'd be worried if this was "something dangerous that I knew and understood well. I find it far more concerning that this is "something I know nothing of. Where was this found?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zadash. After the Spire attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the hands of an assassin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Either it was in the Tri-Spire and they successfully exited with it, or the Xhorhasian were trafficking it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think the Tri-Spire stole it from the Xhorhasians and they were trying to get it back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what we believe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very alien."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yussa, do you know of the Empire, the Clovis Concord, stealing artifacts from other shores?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, if there is any sort of dominion to hold, you take what is available. I mean, "everything as far as Vasselheim to Emon to Ank'Harel. Anyone in power has their threads and "eyes out for what could possibly help them maintain their positions in power and what dangers "there are out there. That is beyond morality, that is just simple intelligence to survive in a world "that is continuously beset by darker powers and things beyond our control. If this was taken "from Xhorhas, then god knows what they were attempting to do with it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make babies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Make babies."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's what the guy said.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very bad people want this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then very bad people will be after you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we're also sometimes bad people, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That does not necessarily mean you're protected. Just be careful."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any better way to keep it secret?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think that is probably the best method you have. Remove it only when absolutely necessary "and for short periods of time. That will protect from divination on this plane, but only this plane."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very good to know. I hope that, now that you understand how much we appreciate your gesture of trust, and how much--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) That's my name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jester of trust. And how much we are putting our faith that you are on the side of good and right, if--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not say I'm on the side of good and right. I am on the side of maintaining "a balance in which society can exist."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We haven't showed--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Have you ever heard of the Traveler?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look in my bag and I get out a little figure that I made of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea what this is."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really big on balance too. Here, I'll leave it for you. That's also a present, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to leave a pamphlet too, so he can find out more information?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll stick it under the-- there you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's glancing to you all, like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She does this a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, she talks to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really powerful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sure."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would appreciate any information that you may glean about this, Uk'otoa, Traveler, the Blooming Grove. I am of the belief that these things are connected, that these chaotic forces are moving towards something unsettling and unbalancing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then I will do my best to do what I can on my end of things. Well, that's been my morning tea."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for your time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Follow me. The rest of you," and he waves his hand across the table, and on the side of the platter where the teacups were, this conjured plate of biscuits appears.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Enjoy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks away, gesturing for you to follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my name!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll promptly follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head up the stairs. Doesn't say a word to you. It curls around and around for a good two minutes. No windows, very little light. The occasional similar sparkling globe emitting a low torchlight until eventually, you come to another door. The staircase continues upward in a spiral, but there's a doorway to the right and a small landing. It opens. He enters, and you enter with him. This chamber-- it is a small domed room, maybe about 15 feet across, and it is circular on the base. It domes to the top, and there is no other exit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just him and Caleb, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm. You enter?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door closes. Darkness. All of a sudden, you see a rune above you that emits a bright blue light that lights the chamber. Everything is in shades of blue. He gestures to the floor, and as you glance down, you can see now, where the blue light hits, this large, runic circle that encompasses the entire chamber is now glowing in response. You recognize it. This is a teleportation circle. This is a receiving teleportation circle. He looks to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How much time do you need?" He gestures to the symbol. "To memorize it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. DM question: I don't know what level, off the top of my head, Teleportation--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe it's 5th-level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So how much time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This isn't the spell; this is the receiving rune. When you learn the spell, you can use that spell to return here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have access to the spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Oh! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can either choose it at a higher level when you decide to go up--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I do have it, but it would take me a lot of hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can memorize the rune.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, he would look at it for a minute and have the rune in his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then there you go. When you finish, he goes, "A quick learner. Good to know. Where did you train?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For years.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Impressive. You have a talented eye for picking up arcanic sigils and glyphs."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was not my intention to bother you here. My friends were very curious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That they are."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was fairly obvious to me that this building was real estate owned by someone of great skill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is designed to keep people like you out, but sometimes, tenacity makes "for interesting breakfast conversations."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I actually thought it was a very bad idea to come here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was. But you came anyway, and look where you are."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sometimes follow my friends places I shouldn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or may one day get you what you seek."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, my apologies on my group's presumptuousness. I hope that we have not made a grave error here today, and if we haven't, I hope to earn that trust, as you say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I followed them into sometimes stupid, unnecessary circumstances. Many of them died helping me. Many "of them I outlived. But I wouldn't be where I am today if I didn't at least trust in the power of others."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good advice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Use who you need to, but know, everyone can be useful if you can mete out their skills."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) I'm sure you have much to do today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sure you do as well." The door behind you opens up again, the light turns dark, and the stairway's behind you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feel for the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you find your way to the staircase; the faint light below guides you to the exit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That eventually spills out down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, eventually leads you back down to the chamber. You guys are down there waiting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I saved you a biscuit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These biscuits are real good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's cinnamon in 'em!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cinnamon-a-mon-a-mon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uniquely, each biscuit tastes different. It is specially designed for your personal interests.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mine tastes like fish! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, bourbon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bourbon biscuit? That's delicious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It sounds really good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Honestly, a fish biscuit doesn't sound terrible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a Red Lobster biscuit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lobster biscuit? That a thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, thanks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lobster?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lobster biscuit is a thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some places call them lobster rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on. We are quitting while we're ahead, let's go. Oh, streusel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys exit the tower, closes behind you.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: How'd it go? How'd it go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What new spell do you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you do? What'd you learn? What did he sell you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel his forehead. Does he have a third eye?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see a cool room or anything? Maybe multiple rooms?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was it made of marble?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did he talk to you about? Did he talk at all or was he just like, "Hmm?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Caleb. What happened in there? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We talked about you guys, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you say? Did you say we're really cool and you love us so much?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He said we were foolish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't say anything. I listened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He said we were foolish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't believe you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I say you are foolish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that was great! We got everything; it was exactly what I said! We would go in, we'd get some magic for you, we'd get some knowledge. Good job, Beau!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are lucky that we are not dead!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. I could barely speak; I could barely get words out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did a great job, apparently! What, the door opened, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caduceus, good job!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are lucky we're not dead. But we are also lucky that, going forward, we're going to get you access to learn more and to grow in an avenue you didn't have open to you before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See, access! That's what I said earlier! He's smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he's going to be a-- if he isn't the death of us, I think he's going to be a good ally. But something's going to be the death of us and it's better just to trust a few people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You met a rockstar and you look like you want to barf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) It was so cool. You learned something new.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (monkey noises)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Access. The international sign for entrance, for let me in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't bullshit everyone in this world.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We didn't bullshit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got luck--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will actually--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How did it go? What kind of conversation did you have before we got in there? What did you guys talk about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was very impressive. You're not very good at it, but it was very impressive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I could tell you were struggling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It started out as a half-truth. We got there without exposing anything too deeply.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were honest without oversharing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He might think we work for the Empire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You expose yourself?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no, not like that. Thought about it, though. Worst case scenario, flash a guy, see what happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell him about your open slots.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did tell him-- wait, I did tell him about-- how'd you know that, Jester?! Am I talking about my slots too much?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You talk about slots a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, now what? What place-- what tower do we break into next? What do we get out of here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, honestly, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't, you know, your hometown in a little bit of danger?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, is it? I hadn't been thinking about that every day. But yeah, it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, maybe we should, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, don't you want to spend more time with your momsies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, of course I do, but my Mama's here and people you care about could be in danger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we could swing by, I wouldn't be opposed to that. But--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But let's stay in one place for a few days first, right? Before moving on. That way we could stay a few days when we get there. Don't want to run off. Your mother misses you; she wants to see you. She wants to spend time with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well yes, of course, Caleb, but people could be in danger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She has a good point. I thought we'd hurry back so that we could check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One more day. Or you'll regret it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could always catch up with you all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So why don't you just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One more night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't you just spend some time with your family and we'll get the cart together and get the supplies together--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Set off in the morning?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Set off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Good with me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds like a deal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was not a good idea. I'm sorry, I didn't mean to hurt your feelings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You made a good call.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't lie to him. Not really, anyway, so, believe what you want. And I

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Whoa, whoa, whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. In the rest of the day that comes about, lest you have any other particular plans to deal with, you get to spend the remainder of this day and the evening with your mother. You guys can pick out your food and supplies for the road. If you're wishing to purchase things, we'll say for the bulk of your journey-- I mean, making stops along the way, at least to get you from Nicodranas to Trostenwald. We'll say if you're heading-- are you heading by way of Zadash to Felderwin or are you crossing over from Alfield to Felderwin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we doing? Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trostenwald. Zadash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we go through Alfield, we can check in on our old contact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we going to Felderwin village?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zadash is west of Felderwin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should go straight to Felderwin, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Trostenwald by way of Alfield and then we'll take the Rillway Road?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To Alfield?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To Felderwin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a straight shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you complete your business and have another--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bryce!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Bryce in Alfield?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bryce is in Alfield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're in Alfield, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bryce!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. You gather your things, the next morning comes after a day of comparative relaxation in the city, which has been not too bad. The next morning comes, the cart has been fetched, you have the rest of your things. Your mother catches you as you're about to head out and goes, "Jester, would you like any of your things from your room before you leave?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, I mean--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The O-Town Posters?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This dress is a little bit messed up now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, no worries." She goes off and begins packing a few things in a little bag, and she comes out with the rest of you. You guys are getting things in the cart and she steps out and there's a little bit of hesitance as she steps beyond the threshold of the Chateau. Takes a deep breath, and then takes a few more steps. Takes like the 15 feet to the cart and goes, "Here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Mama.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I had something made for you while you were at sea." She pulls out of a small pouch that she has on the side this thin, golden chain with, about the size of a raisin, a little ruby set in with really pretty filigree, and places it around your neck. "This way, no matter where "you are, no matter what's happening, you always have the Ruby with you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got you something, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What did you get me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It comes from an island in the middle of the sea. Very, very sweet; just like your little sapphire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to miss you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I miss you already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aww."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll send you messages as much as I can, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please do. Every day, if you can."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take care of her."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know not the vengeance I will bring upon you; and the army of men, "and women, and in-between, that will do what I tell them to."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no... Yeah, no. We-- Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. We love her; almost as much as you do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not possible."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Half as much as you do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be safe, everyone."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Love you, Mama.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I love you too, Jester."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on Nugget, let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (panting) Jumps into the cart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh that's-- No. Yeah, that's the-- Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel Sprinkle starting to back up around your neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) It's okay. I just stare at Mama, watch the Chateau as we go. Don't take my eyes off it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hyah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why are you saying hyah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't we have horses?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I've got them right here, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hyah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the cart takes off, making its way to the northward streets to exit Nicodranas, Marion Lavore watches you all leave and gives a quiet wave as you all disappear into the streets. As she disappears around the bend and you turn around in your seat to look ahead, you can see the open blue sky above you, and looking towards the distant Cyrios Mountains in the path before you, you make your way northward. So this is quite a few days travel. I'll put aside my Nicodranas notes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll for initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each person coming through is having to provide paperwork that says where you're going, who you're going to see-- It's customs, essentially. It's getting close to your passing through; what do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who do we know--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I forgot about this. We've done this before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It took four days to get here, we've done it before, we would have known this was going to happen. Not the amount of security, but that there was security.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't we have a way to get back in? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From somebody in Zadash? Didn't we? Shit. What was that guy's name? That, after we won the thing and then we were in his-- Where you met the guy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Super specific so far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trent Iki-- Ichi--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ikithon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When you met him--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't meet him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When Yasha met him-- Remember we were in that party?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so there was Yedaka, who's the guy who runs the actual event and helms the Victory Pit, if that's what you're talking about. If not, then you're referring to the Starosta of the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Starosta!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What city is it?

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Zadash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was... Starosta Wyatt Fedar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have paperwork from him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I could forge something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The way you did in Zadash?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but that's where we're heading to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have any pieces of paperwork that have his handwriting? Or his signature?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I guess we could say we are going to Starosta What's-His-Fuck in Al--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Field?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have paperwork.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I do have his.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that what we were looking for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the smarmy guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The gnome? Kosh Starosta?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Costa... rosta?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kosh was his name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kosh, Kosh, Starosta Kosh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So would you like to go ahead and attempt that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what would you want it to say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That we are heading back--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kosh Clearbarker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kosh what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clearbarker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Clearbarker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That we were in Nicodranas on his behalf, and that we are heading back to Alfield to return with his new... pet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make a d20 roll with your proficiency bonus and your dexterity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it ought to be on a day that-- You should use the mote.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zoom zoom zoom. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and make your roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add proficiency and dexterity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that would be 20 plus proficiency-- 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel pretty confident about your piece of paperwork you presented. The DC was definitively lowered because it was something that you had existing paperwork as an example of handwriting on, so upon passing through, you present your paperwork and the guard there gives you a look. "All right. You are returning to Alfield, what is your business in Nicodranas?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we were getting his new pet. They're very rare apparently, or something, hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, and you are returning to the Empire? You're not staying in the Empire."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are returning to the Empire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, and whom do you pray to?"
