lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To... To the old platinum dragon of course! Just like everybody else!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. That's cocked! Balls, I wanted to take the 17 that was barely there. Deception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold here for a second." And makes a whistle and some the other guards begin to circle and they're going to do a full inspection on the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aww, do we have anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have anything bad?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we just have Nugget.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is this our invisible cart or did we ditch that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think this is just a regular cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The cart with invisible shit on it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we'll do the same thing this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you explain how it works?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. It's to ward off bandits, makes it a little easier to-- Feel free though, it's just an illusion on the cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let them through." They go ahead and wave you though. The high-rolling paperwork helped you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Now, the open blue skies of the coast give to the winter gray of the Marrow Valley. You have four days to Trostenwald. Is there anything you wish to do in that four day period, or no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, just work on that whole bamfing in and out and staying with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an animal handling check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And occasionally will listen to you, but mostly just seems excited that things are around and he gets to go out. You get the sense that the entire time you were gone he was cooped up in your old room and is just like (excited panting) looking at everything around and occasionally leaps out of the cart after something and chases it down and then just bamfs back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, at least there's that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like a tether teleport. You make your way to Trostenwald?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're doing a good job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I finished this book; I thought you might like it. It's about romance at sea with a sailor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it called?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I get a name for it? If I did, Liam does not remember it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you got a name for it, you just got a description of what it contained.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is the name of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Salty Sea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Salty Sea! Oh, wait. I feel like I--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Salty Sea, huh? Heyo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it. Enjoy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to refine that oil that I bought into more... burn-y oil? Is that something I can do on a moving cart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have your alchemical supplies with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean I have, it says alchemist supplies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make-- This will be proficiency plus intelligence modifier; make it with disadvantage because you're on a moving cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Intelligence modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'd say if you focus on it entirely from your trip between Nicodranas and Trostenwald, you could probably prepare half of that amount.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're prepared as Alchemist Oil.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys make your way to Trostenwald?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And one of these nights, I talk to Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is perfect. As we're moving along if at any point you want to interject just jump in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have that spell that you can talk to people? Send them messages very far away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As long as you know they're on this plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do. Could you do one of those for me? To somebody? Is that a thing you can do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe I can try. It's usually somebody that I know of, so if you describe them pretty well, maybe I can?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Her name is Dairon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dairon, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was a... roommate at the Cobalt Soul.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, extra-special roommate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She taught me a lot of really great things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want to make sure she's okay because she got sent to the war front on the Xhorhasian Coast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I think she's fine. She was just there to check it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When did she get sent away?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When we were still in Zadash. Last time that I was there, I talked to her and she was leaving, and then went back and she hadn't come back yet, so it's been a few months.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does she look like? It helps me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's got a shaved head, and she wears dark-colored clothes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, dark clothes...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's got super buff muscles--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Super buff, got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Cause she's been working out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you love her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I-- We've had good times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good times. Good times, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have notes somewhere in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can keep-- in my head, just keep saying those things as I'm like: Think about her, picture her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm meditating on Dairon and as I meditate, I--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you want me to say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, girl--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, girl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Heading to Felderwin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Heading to Felderwin. This is Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is Beau. Might be heading to Zadash after that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe heading to Zadash after that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, if you're in the area, hit me up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, if you're in the area, hit me up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Booty call.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Booty call?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many words? That's 22.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three more. I think it's 25 words.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Call me back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Call me back!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has no means to call you back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should have told you that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right, but she kn-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, is this Sending?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sending, they can respond to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, sweet. Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's how it's done in the past.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sending, they can respond to me, that's right! I totally forgot!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! She'll be gone for the next month to the Bladegarden to help with the assault!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's in Bladegarden, got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's in Bladegarden. Narrow it down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it, Bladegarden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I told her that, though, before she sent it, that she was in Bladegarden, because I would have known that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Waiting for the call back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, roll an intelligence check, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just straight intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 17, natural 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. You are particularly descriptive in your ability to recall details about Dairon, because you are not familiar with this individual.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's got a longer nose, pointed--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you give a very specific detail about them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fierce eyebrows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Dungeon Master.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just waiting for a, "Hey," back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just want to let you know that, while we're on the sea, I had a talk with my goddess and that friend of yours is still out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Friend of mine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that old friend of yours that you haven't seen in a while. What's his name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vandran?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's the one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you know that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I asked the Wildmother.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this the same as Jester talking to the Traveler? You hear from the Wildmother?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I would be speaking to things I didn't necessarily know about. I don't entirely know the Traveler, nor entirely understand what the Traveler is, but I know the Wildmother.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You asked about him for me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. "Making amends," whatever that means.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was making amends?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One way or another.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a very particular flavor of goodness that come from those who are offered so much temptation. I have some faith in you. Back to the horses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got one, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, hold on. Let me finish up here while this conversation's happening. You hear a response: (strained) "I do not recognize this voice, but I'm familiar with this magic. I am "recovering in Bladegarden, but am safe." That's all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She hit me up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Really-- I mean--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not me, not, "She was hitting me up,"-- you up, through me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's in Bladegarden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She sounded either sleepy or injured or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But she's safe now. So Bladegarden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She sounded way into you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like super-duper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Jester. That's a big deal. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On a different night-- I assume we're camping every night,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Off the path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The general roadside issues that would come your way are less of a challenge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just for setting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I borrow you for a word?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. 'Sup?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I felt very exposed with that man. Um--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was just collecting my thoughts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are people who would flay me like a cat if they could get their hands on me, so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he say something to you about your past when you were in there with him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, but he was hard to read.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think he saw into you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) I don't know, Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a man of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I don't like to not know. I like traveling with you people and I don't want to take unnecessary risks, so, I'm not telling you what to do-- I could not tell you what to do-- but if-- for me to stay with you all, I can't keep poking my head up like a mole from a hole in the ground because someone is going to cave my skull in if I do it in the wrong place, and if you all are with me, you will die with me. That man in Rexxentrum, he would spread my guts out onto the stone floor if he could get his hands on me now, if he knew where I was, so I factor that into all of my thinking everywhere we go. Everywhere I have been for five years, I have been looking over my shoulder, so it's not really fair to all of you because we are linked like this now. He is arguably the most powerful man in the Empire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The man in Rexxentrum or Yussa?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ikithon. I just wanted you to understand me better. As much as I am able to have friends, I like you, all right? I don't people very well, I am well aware. It's been a long time since I had a lot of practice, but I have to be careful, and if we can't be careful enough, I have to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have to go, or do you want to go? Because what I'm hearing from you, Caleb, is that you don't understand that you have friends. We're here, willing to defend you and kick some ass just like we did for Fjord--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is beside the point!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If he finds us, you all will just be thrown into the fire with me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not a choice you get to make. You can either accept this--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're talking around each other. That is not the point that I am arguing; I am saying that if we are going to stay together we have to be careful. Careful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's why I thought I would talk to people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just persons like that one in that tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you'd be excited. I thought I did a damn good job in there. I thought me and Caduceus both did. I was talking to Nott and we thought for damn sure that you would be so stoked about this goddamn fucking tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I wander away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow! (shouting) Wow! Fucking cool, Caleb!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb is really cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he's cool. (shouting) You're cool, Caleb! See, Jester thinks you're fucking cool! Because she's your fucking friend!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm trying to sleep. What are y'all doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (even louder) Sorry, Fjord!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Do you have any business in Trostenwald while you're there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was amazing, just amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two incongruent conversationalists, I love it. All right, cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gustav's out of jail, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing in Trostenwald.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get you to Alfield, we'll say, amongst the whole crew, maybe-- let's see here...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We still can create food and water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool. You travel-- this would be two days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is Gustav still in the town, or has he left town? Just out of idle curiosity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to ask around?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just while we're there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, while you're there, go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asking around? No sign of Gustav.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The few people that knew of him, only because of the conversation and local talk about (old person's voice) that terrible circus that came through town, that carnival that killed all them people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Greatest show on Earth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gustav fucked off as soon as he was let out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to Alfield, or are we bypassing Alfield?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to Alfield and then bypassing Zadash, is what you were saying, and then going straight to Felderwin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Veering right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way, two days, to Felderwin-- I'm sorry, to Alfield. Any business in Alfield?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we checking in with Bryce?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, do we--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure. Just say what's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My goodness, it's been some time, friends! You look traveled."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What can I do to help you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, mostly, we're just wondering if you have any information about what's been going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The attacks came from underground."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Underground?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It wasn't a direct assault. Apparently-- and this put us in a bit of a tizzy recently-- "they managed to just appear in the city from underneath."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were they able to repel these attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know the exact number of dead; you'd probably have to ask."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you worried? It's pretty close to here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm a bit worried, yes. We're all a bit worried. We don't want to alarm the populace, but "(sighs) rumors spread and we do our best to quell them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's your sewer system like here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's more of a-- we don't have any of the fancy subterranean sewers as cities like Zadash "to the north. It's mostly a dig-a-hole, outhouse-type scenario."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That might actually be safer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. We're just hoping that there isn't much of a reason to stop in Alfield. At least we "know that Felderwin supplies most of the Empire with its food and crops and such, so there seems "to be some strategic reason for that assault, though I don't see what purpose Alfield has in the "larger spectrum, so I'm banking on that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where are you off to?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Felderwin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, good news is they've already been attacked. Hopefully the lightning doesn't strike twice."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They stole whatever it was they were trying to steal, I guess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's exactly what I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi, yes, we met briefly when you passed through here earlier."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good to see you again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pleasure to see you again as well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should be on our way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Say hi to everyone for us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A bit quicker than we thought, I'm afraid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all right. If there's anything that I can do to aid you if you need to pass through "again, just let me know. You know where to find me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good to see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to see you as well. Travel safe."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, would a letter of good note get us any further in case we run into anybody?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe not from Bryce. I mean, I like Bryce.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bryce is cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm not really involved in the red tape of most "things. If it's another lawmaster you're going to speak with, that's one thing, but--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's worth asking, I suppose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You wouldn't happen to have any handwriting samples of some lawmasters?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have the handwriting samples.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Other than, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Happen to have any forgeable paperwork of other cities' lawmasters?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have any deposited checks or bank statements?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stolen mail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I don't."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sign-in sheets, even?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good! Because that would be illegal and you're a person of the law.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am indeed, and that would be illegal."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great. We don't have to arrest you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You passed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a trick!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well done. Virtuous indeed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wonderful, thank you for the opportunity to prove my virtue."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Bryce. Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry we're so weird sometimes, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be honest, weirder come through here fairly often, especially these days."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have grown since the last time we rolled through this town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grown weirder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. The direction you've grown is curious, but in all sincerity, it's good to see "you all. All right, be safe."

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Be safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jinx.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jinx indeed. All right, back to business."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should move quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They head to the rest of their day's work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up and out, I say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hyah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep, that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, give us a hyah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hyah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The horses are going to go if I ask them to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Git along, little doggies!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll say from Alfield's about a three-and-a-half days' travel. Gathering your supplies there, making your way eastward towards Felderwin, is there any business you wish to attend to on the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Rillway Road, and we're going to get to a bridge before we hit Felderwin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I used the ribbon from my mom's house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got you a present.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you! Aww, that's so nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're cookbooks, and one of them uses mushrooms a lot!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aww, that's so exciting!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just in case, you know, you wanted to change up your recipes, or you thought you needed anything cool like that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It never even occurred to me that you get a book about cooking. That's so great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? The pictures are really nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, this is cool. Aww, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do my best to make it through this mushroom cookbook.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not a whole thing, but I've gone through most of the paper purchased, and read the history of Nicodranas, (goofy voice) the general knowledge of the history of Nicodranas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (normal voice) That, my friends, is the sound of history.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've often wondered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (goofy voice) Their main export is oysters. Carry on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You meet a dragon. "What is the main export of Nicodranas?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! I've been defeated! Curse your worldly understanding of trade!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I knew I should have gone with entertainment as the subject! You get a piece of the pie!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your orange piece! That's not even an orange piece. Anyway, in crossing the bridge to cross the Eistus River, cresting the hills before it, you can already see the low haze of gray and brown that's gently fading over the region. As you reach the peak and look down upon the familiar sight of the once-green farmland that you had passed by when you were heading north toward Shadycreek Run, you can already see a fair patch of the Tillage lies black and ashen. Probably a quarter of it. As you begin to make your way towards the outskirts of the city, you can already see small squadrons of Righteous Brand patrolling the fields. I mean, a dozen small squadrons of about 50 soldiers each.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whistles)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come upon the outside of Felderwin, which is built not too far from the Eistus River, you can already see there are a number of buildings burned and blackened on the opposite end of the fields. The fields are on the northern side of the city. On the southeastern side, there's a section of the town that appears to have burned or burnt down to varying degrees, depending on buildings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to put my hood up, the mask on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Anyone else?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll human up for a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, where are--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, no. Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where is your family? Where are they located? I'm sure not the actual city-city, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean the clan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they don't live in the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about... you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The fellow? My friend?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll lead them towards--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're doing their best to lock things down as this investigation is still being completed as to what transpired here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to start heavily drinking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She angrily gives a few offhanded orders at a distance, while it looks like the source of this blue flash, a male figure, is standing where previously was not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Approaches with haste towards this woman. They begin to whisper for a moment before he shoos off the rest of the guards, and the two of them begin to walk together, the pair of them having a conversation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't recognize either?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You recognize those people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see them. You don't recognize them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you recognize them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said they look like someone we met previously?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning it was a male elder elven figure, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just like Yussa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just like Yussa, but Yussa was of Gwardan descent. This appears to be of northern elf, which most of that bloodline stems from Malaismere and what split off into Bysaes Tyl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Learn about that too, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got a lot of reading to do this weekend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're talking amongst each other and then walk and disappear around a corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we hear anything they said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're too far away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Man, I wish I could read lips.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to go sneak up or anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was the blue flash from him apparating?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Do you continue on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess. Are we curious about that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, we are!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I recognize that person from my time at school?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recognize both of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) Holy boly. All you've got to do is ask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The woman is Lady Vess DeRogna, the Archmage of Antiquity at the Cerberus Assembly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, I didn't hear you there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lady Vess DeRogna, the Archmage of Antiquity of the Cerberus Assembly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gagging)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Archmage of something, Cerberus Assembly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Antiquity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Antiquity at the Cerberus--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, I'm shaking right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I recognize them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Percy's in my head dissecting that title so hard right now. I can't, though. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The man, the elder elf, is Martinet Lunidus Da'leth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One more time, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Largemont?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: D-A-apostrophe-L-E-T-H.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. I get two letters in and that's all she wrote.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: MLD!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This won't come back to bite you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Martinet Lunidus-- that's all I got.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's making the names so hard now that we can't make fun of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are names I got on a list over a year ago that I'm remembering now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is he the Archmage of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Archmage of Domestic Protections.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh jeez, he's Homeland Security!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go fucking dig through my emails. Jesus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, Archmage of what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Domestic Protection.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're fine. We're just going into Nott's backstory. I don't need to review nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lady Ve DeRogna?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vess DeRogna.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lasagna?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it? Vess--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: DeRogna.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! Domestic Protection.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, not there. Yeah. Lady Vess DeRogna.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If that is the case, and we're in the wagon at this point, Caleb just fucking lies down in the cart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as you're in the back, they can't see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Lies down in the cart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on? Are you sleepy? Are you getting sleepy, Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, there's people out there he knows, you dummy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're moving on anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a little on edge. You're not dumb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is an inn called the Glassy Grass Inn that you're familiar with, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Glassy Grass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That has burned to the ground. There is another building next to that. There is the Brenatto Apothecary that is also burned to the ground. There are people rummaging through the rubble, through some of their homes, still looking and pulling out elements of whatever they can gather of their former life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stop the cart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (neighing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anyone around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there is a crownsguard-- a pair of crownsguard that are walking this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll cast Disguise Self and be some gnomish old lady. I'm going to walk over to the burned-down apothecary and start looking around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For anything in particular, or just trying to make it look like you're looking around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking for identifying signs of life or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance around, looking through the visible rubble, moving a few things. Don't appear to be any signs of life, nor any signs of death, immediately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I look for buttons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check now that you're poring through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw shit. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crownsguard walk by and stop. One of them, a female, looks over and goes, "Hey, you looking for help?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I was just looking to see-- I knew the man who worked here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's terrible, isn't it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's terrible? What happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We don't get this kind of thing this far west. We're not supposed to. I don't want to "fight those things."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The cricks. The things that came in and did this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know what-- were you here? Do you know what happened to this place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeza?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. They haven't found a body, so that's something. His boy Luke was found safe "and is staying with... what's her name?" Looks over to the other guy. The other person, the woman, looks at him and goes, "At Old Edith's house."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I know Edith?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know of Old Edith, yeah. An older woman a few buildings down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, Luke's okay."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did the party that came in to attack-- were they taking prisoners, or were they killing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I watched friends of mine begin to slow down. Anyway."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were you there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. Thankfully not on the front line."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did they get away, the cricks? Did they go underground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They went back where they came, through the tunnels, and collapsed them behind them."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which tunnels? Where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There. Between the city and the tillage." He points in the direction where those two were walking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry for your loss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Did you know them?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry for yours, too." The two continue walking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want help looking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. If you could, could you look around this wreckage a bit and see if you find anything interesting?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do a general look around to see if I can get a sign of life coming from anywhere in the rubble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be more of an investigation, since you're looking through rubble as opposed to peering through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are the nearest guards at this moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ones that you were just speaking to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They walked off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're walking off now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wipe dirt on my face and into my beard, stand up, and pull my hood up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to help Nott search through the rubble.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I'm going to start searching through the rubble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's make an investigation check as a group. One of you helms it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll helm it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With their help, you have advantage on the roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, two 14s. That is a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The basement door is locked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will unlock it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an attempt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not moving at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester, open the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm casting Mage Armor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb. Open it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to slam into the door to open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not budging.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, Nott. Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At advantage, strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thud) It's not budging. That lock is holding tight, far more than it should for its design.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it magical?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I can cast Dispel Magic? Is it magic? Is it trapped?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It wasn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Dispel Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you open the basement?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stepping down the stairs underneath, it's a small chamber, no more than 15 by 15 feet. The room is tossed, not like you remember. There's a pile of broken table shards in the far right corner. There's additional shattered glass all over the floor here. There's an iron chest, roughly three feet long by a foot wide, that sits in the far left corner. A single chair holds the center of the room. That's what remains inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lighting it up in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it look like there was a struggle in here, or it's been turned by someone looking for something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or blood, or injury.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or maybe they came in through--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the center chair seems perfect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huh. You know what that makes me think of? I mean, that seems-- that's weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, did you want to finish that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured you would know because I'm guessing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have an idea. I have my opinion. I'm just curious–

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, what's your opinion?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone was interrogated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was yours?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was thinking that maybe there was an invisible person tied to the chair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's way worse. Yours is much better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go up, and can I touch and see if there's an invisible person in the chair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is not an invisible person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was a little spooked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the Mighty Nein special.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott. You clearly have some personal attachment to this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sit in the chair and see what I see. What does it look like from the chair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's Will Graham-ing it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're tearing me apart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on your investigation check, you gather that the chair was probably placed here after this, whatever transpired in this room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What would someone want from here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there another way out of here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He kept chemicals.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second set of stairs into the house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no other exit from this chamber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No hidden ones, nothing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll search with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, are you helping?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'll help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get advantage on this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a box, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's an iron chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No doors, no other exits. It's just that stairway, from what you can find.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should be very careful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or is it locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is locked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will unlock it. That's 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In spite of the resistance, the spell, you (click) and see a brief (poof) as the Arcane Lock is dispelled and unlocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You open it up. Make a constitution saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A brief puff of what looks like a dull black gas (small explosion) in your face, and you pull out of the way and inhale a little bit. It's a weird dizzying sensation that comes over your body for a second, but you manage to shrug it off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take another drink of booze and look in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see inside a retractable silver tripod of some kind. The apex looks like it's set to hold something. It's three of them that come together, and you imagine, where it'd open up, there's a little platform beneath it. They all don't meet, really, at the top. There's three things that are set to hold a device of some kind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like maybe this old dodecahedron down here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. Does it look like the same metal of the dodecahedron? Any similar characteristics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't look like it has similar characteristics or metal, per se, but you can try and fit it in if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Later, somewhere else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Try it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somewhere else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get out of here. Let's take it to-- have you ever seen this before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. No, I've never seen this before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything else in the chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, there are three empty vials. One full one that seems to contain-- it seems like it's on the verge of liquid and gas. There is liquid in there, but a lot of it seems to be this heavy, fog-like condensation, a dull gray color.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll grab it and throw it to Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a picture, and a picture!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "As we continue to invoke the beacon with extremely focused energy of different spectrums "and sources, the effects unleashed are curious, and reach far beyond this laboratory. The dunamis field--" Is that right? Have we heard that before?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "-- sightlessly encompassed an entire portion of the town, with locals complaining of an ill, "sluggish sensation--" that's the Slow "--being dragged down. Others at different experiments "rumored of witnessing people and livestock moving at a noticeably faster or slower rate "within entire sections of the city in proximity to the laboratory--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That guy mentioned people feeling slow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Based on our previous experiments and extracted techniques from captured Kryn operatives--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, "rumors we squashed by spreading a batch of molded fruit crop."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Kryn operatives?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kryn, that's what they actually are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Based on our previous experiments extracted from captured Kryn operatives, the abilities of "dunamis and dunamancy within Xhorhas appears to focus around the manipulation of gravity--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Time. Yeah, gravity and time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "--entropy, and time. Yet, while the basis of what dunamancy origin glyphs we were able to "acquire show it to exist outside of the established schools of magic--" What you got?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) "Blah blah blah, extremely difficult to work with. Attempts to isolate "a substance capable containing and sustaining the dunamantic energies within a casing has "proven both time-consuming and costly--" You have some of the same stuff. Wait, look--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "This magic, by my theory, is deeply rooted in ancient history of some arcana we take for "granted. If these beacons are just the surface, what eons-old rituals have been lurking beneath "the citadel in Ghor Dranas?" Ghor Dranas?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Once I can remove the beacon itself from the process, I hope to have this alchemist produce "a number of batches over the next 12 to 16 months, refining the method with each step "until we can certify its use in combat." Is that your friend, the alchemist?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They were using Yeza.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Imagine--" something something, "--could be "accomplished by the Assembly should we further learn to command these--" There's so many things I can't read because it's burned away! "--existence. The dreams are already thrilling."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Between the fragments of power we've only begun to "unlock within these beacons, and the capabilities of the Kryn on the battlefield, I surmise they "have been learning to bend and break the threads of destiny for hundreds of years. Be this truth, "I cannot imagine the Raven Queen looks down upon them favorably either, though the thought brings "a laugh to my lips." Do I recognize any of this handwriting? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not recognize any handwriting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't? They're going to be so pissed when they find out we have that thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have a piece of dunamis.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a vial.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a tripod.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Jester's right. I think this dodecahedron goes into that tripod.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hundred percent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we should do it here because, like Yussa said, we pull this thing out selectively.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How does your friend fit into all of this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone else was. Right? Your people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your people were doing experiments and trying to find out and harness the power of-- What? It's your people! It's the people that you know and trained with.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's because they haven't-- he hasn't, in terms of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, fuck him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Wow, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's your people that have done this to my people, and we have to find them both.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it worth trying it again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not right now. I have to go see Lady Edith right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there any way to cover our tracks here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb absolutely pukes in the middle of the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, that's going to be way harder to cover up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not about you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything else in this room that we need to turn over before we get out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the investigations that you've already put through, that seems to be most of anything of interest. Everything else has either been removed, or is just broken furniture and whatever this laboratory once was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put everything back in the chest and bring it with us. Put the chest in the haversack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chest is a little big for a haversack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can put the foldable tripod--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a three-foot by one-foot--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we re-lock the chest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The haversack is limited, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have a Bag of Holding from...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That Fjord is in possession of?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a Bag of Holding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You found it under the bed of...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who has it? I will gladly carry it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Iron Shepherds, with Lorenzo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should try and lock everything up and maybe break the chair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why should we break the chair?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I actually do a little pass on the chair and see if I see any signs that someone's been tied to it, someone's been questioned?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How was it locked from the outside?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Things that Beau would know that people would do in her realm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww, Jesus fucking Christ. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a chair that was probably placed here after this attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We already knew that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably whoever locked this chest put this chair here and then locked the room as they left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I agree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go. Quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to try and-- There's no way to--? Actually, I'm going to try and lock the chest again when we leave. I'm going to use-- not magically, obviously, but Thaumaturgy to close it and lock it, or will that not work with Thaumaturgy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not Arcane Locked, but it's locked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You didn't see anything when you sat in the chair, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I just saw the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This place is creeping me out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was there anything under the chair? On the underside of the chair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Appears to be a chair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh? No? Nothing under the chair?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're-- I think we should--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone's come back in. Whoever--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why the chair? Why in middle of the room? Why lock it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, the chair is facing the chest, correct, is what you said? I mean, look at the amount of time that we've all lost staring in the dodecahedron.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything in my time of torture and awful that would tell me what this chair is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. It's a chair. It's a standard chair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't mean a magic chair. I mean the setup in the room, the mess around it...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. No, you gather that whoever came down here last brought the chair with them to probably lock their things and leave it here and then lock the basement behind them, not expecting anyone to make their way in in the interim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to go now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, go. Do we need to clean up Caleb's puke? Will somebody be able to find us with his puke?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus has been cleaning it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have beetles; they eat things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We took the trap out? We took the vial?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We took everything. We're going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You exit the basement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lock it as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You think it locked. It got bashed open by Yasha, and between that and the Dispel, it's probably not going to hold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. Let's get away from here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where do we go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need to check on--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said Old Edith?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lead the way. We're going to move the cart. You need to not panic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to not use that dodecahedron anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not right around here, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not here, no. It's staying in the bag, don't worry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take another drink and then look outside to see if anyone's watching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You look around the vicinity. It looks like there are some people who are looking over, seeing you in the ruins. They're other civilians, a couple farmers and townsfolk. They're not staring; they're just walking and noticing you all standing in the rubble. They keep walking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll go back to the cart. How far is Edith?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a five minute walk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Cart or walk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cart? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a few houses down. It's very quick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't want the cart parked in front of the creepy rubble house. I'm going to move it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is currently closed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll Disguise Self as a halfling. Plump face, tan skin, braids. I'll start pounding on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are wrinkles that scrunch the face in this perpetual smile, and the eyes are almost beady behind the folded forehead and lids that have fallen with time. "Hello? Can I help you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Edith, it's me. Where's my son?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, I thought you were dead."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not. Let me see him right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My goodness. Luke? Luke?" You see a small halfling boy, maybe no more than five years old, peek around the doorway. Shaggy, light brown hair, blue eyes. "Yeah?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sniffles) Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Daddy said the goblins killed you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I brought you that and other toys. How are you? Are you okay? Did they hurt you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Edith says Daddy went away to help the war, but I think she's lying. He's probably dead too, "like I thought you were."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they touch you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. Daddy locks me away when the mean lady comes by."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pick him up and give him a big hug and a kiss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stiffens up. He's overwhelmed and untrusting of this scenario--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you still pick him up. "The mean lady with the pointy ears."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. She comes often?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mm-hmm."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You go somewhere safe when she comes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Daddy would put me in my room."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the last time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was the night when all the loud noises happened."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Daddy pushed me out of the house and said go, so I ran to Edith. Everything was on fire."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good job. Stay safe. When you were running away, did you see anything of Dad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. It was just a lot of scary people in armor."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry I wasn't there to protect you. I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mommy, where were you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was far away. I was trying to get back. I was trying to come back, I was. I was trying so hard, but I don't have-- I'm not strong enough to come back yet. (stutters) But know that I'm always thinking of you. I send you things so you remember me, and I hope Dad gives them to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I get presents, but he just says they're from somebody."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, that's fine. Yeah, it would be hard to understand, but I love you so much, and I've never stopped thinking about you and trying to come home. I didn't want to go away. I'm going to find your father. I will, and then maybe we can be a family again. Maybe-- I will find him. I promise you, all right? You just have to be that smart boy that I know and stay safe, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is Daddy alive?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In my heart I think he is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you're alive again?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will be, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then don't die." He turns around and walks back into the house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. Sorry, Edith.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm just happy to see you're okay. I'll watch the boy. Is there anything I can do to...? "I'm real sorry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have family somewhere else, somewhere out of the city? Out of the village, I mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My husband passed away seven years ago, and it's just been me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah. Is this--? I don't know. Are there any strong-- How do I--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need somewhere--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll give her 200 gold. Use this to buy new locks, or a bigger door, or--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could send them to Alfield if you wanted. I'm sure Bryce could take care of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if the next attack is there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with Fjord. I don't think they necessarily found what they were looking for when they came here, but I think they didn't find it and they might move on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So they'll be okay here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you don't feel comfortable here, you should tell them--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. I don't know. I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm making guesses like the rest of us. None of us can honestly tell you what the right call is here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, Veth, wherever you go, let me know how I can help. If you need us to leave, "we'll leave. I mean, you've given me enough to at least get out of town for a while."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, maybe lay low for a little while, a few days, a few weeks, and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can do that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can send a message anytime.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, yes. She can send you a magical message, and you can tell us where you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, I can do that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could send them to Nicodranas, I'm sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, my mama--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a long journey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is. I don't know how far or fast this is moving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not thinking straight right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we all need to talk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll come back soon. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's a good boy, Veth. You did good."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Yeah?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take care of yourself."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Walking and quietly talking to each other, heading towards the rubble of the apothecary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to get in the cart and move now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pick up next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You sneaky motherfucker!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was looking forward to a shopping episode. This was really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was good, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, this was nice and gentle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sam Riegel!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't wait to interrogate you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, we're going to use a chair! That's so exciting!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the thread that holds it all together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why the chair, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, I mean, look at it this way. If you guys had come here instead of Nicodranas, you would have been here when all this went down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh,

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, dude. Wow. As Beau might say, "Wow! Wow."

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: (shouting) Wow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) Hey, Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (shouting) Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway-- I know, RIP, ears at the end of the episode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: RIP, ears. Don't at me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. All right, guys. We'll pick up here next Thursday. It's going to be a hell of a week for all of us. We'll see some of you guys at the art gallery this weekend. We'll see some of you guys at the live show on Saturday. Super excited to have everyone step back into their Vox Machina shoes. We'll pick up at this crazy point next Thursday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [no audio] [music]
